item.title: Use Vim-like commands in Firefox
item.description: Using Vim commands allows us to reduce the number of times we need to lift our hands away from the keyboard to reach for your mouse. While most code editors typically support Vim commands, we can’t say the same for most other applications. Luckily, with browser extensions, we are able to use Vim commands in the browser.
